topic.title: Configure Facts Updates
topic.shortdesc: Foreman updates the host information using the Puppet facts. Foreman updates the provisioning information with the first interface returned from the Puppet facts.

ol.li: Select the Administer drop down on the top right of the window.
Select Settings, and then select the Provisioning tab.
Edit the ignore_puppet_facts_for_provisioning setting, and set it to true.
